projects.title: Ngāruawāhia Dog Pound, Waikato
points: GDC completed an Architectural Concept Design and Plans (including designs for the car park).
GDC completed a Geotechnical Investigation for the building and car park, provided a 3 Waters Assessment Report, and completed a Field Survey / Topo Survey.
GDC completed Structural Design Drawings and Documentation, Three Waters Design Drawings and Documentation (including the carpark), a Fire Design Report, an Acoustic Report, and Lighting Design.
GDC completed the Resource Consent Application with an Environmental Assessment and applied for Building consent.

projects.title: Ngāruawāhia Dog Pound, Waikato
points: GDC completed an Architectural Concept Design and Plans (including designs for the car park).
GDC completed a Geotechnical Investigation for the building and car park, provided a 3 Waters Assessment Report, and completed a Field Survey / Topo Survey.
GDC completed Structural Design Drawings and Documentation, Three Waters Design Drawings and Documentation (including the carpark), a Fire Design Report, an Acoustic Report, and Lighting Design.
GDC completed the Resource Consent Application with an Environmental Assessment and applied for Building consent.

projects.title: Mokau Kohunui Marae, Piopio, Waikato
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed an Initial Seismic Assessment (ISA), a Detailed Geotechnical Investigation for building consent, Design and Investigation for stormwater and wastewater including a soakage test, and Preliminary Structural Design for this project.

projects.title: Brightlands Childcare Centre, Hamilton, Waikato
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed the Architectural Detailed Drawings and Specifications set, coordinated with project partners, compiled all necessary documentation, and lodged it for building consent. GDC completed a Contamination Report, Preliminary Site Investigation (PS1), Simple Traffic Report, 3 Waters Impact Assessment, 3 Waters and Carpark Design, Structural Design including Foundation Design, a Fire Report, Site Inspection and Construction Monitoring, and a Geotechnical Investigation and Report for this project.

projects.title: 150 Dickens Street, Napier, Hawke's Bay
projects.description: GDC completed a Detailed Seismic Assessment (DSA) report and Seismic Strengthening Design to achieve 67% NBS. GDC completed a Geotechnical Investigation and Report for the rear extension and delivered an Architectural Design Package for both the fit-out of the existing building and the two-storey extension. GDC completed Structural Design for the new block extension, Seismic Strengthening CAD Drawings, Emergency Lighting Design, and an Electrical Capacity Assessment for this project.

projects.title: Cambridge Family Health, Cambridge, Waikato
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed the Structural Design of the extension and alterations for this project.

projects.title: Waiora Building, Waikato Hospital, Hamilton, Waikato
projects.jobDescription: GDC provided Structural Design services for the Molecular Labs Accommodation Project. This included alterations to Level 3 and Level 4 of the Wairoa Building, covering Developed Design, Detailed Design, and Construction Monitoring.

projects.title: Raglan Arts Centre, Waikato
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed a Structural Assessment of the existing retaining wall, a Geotechnical Investigation and Report, Site Inspections, and Construction Monitoring. GDC completed Stormwater Design, Repair Design of the Retaining Wall, Concrete Pavement Design and prepared detailed drawings.

projects.title: Te Awamarahi Marae, Onewhero, Waikato
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed a Geotechnical Investigation and Report, and a Structural Condition Assessment for this project.

projects.title: Matahiwi Marae, Clive, Hawke's Bay
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed Truss Design and Roof Load Assessment for this project.

projects.title: Tuakau Dog Pound
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed Architectural Design, a Landscape Plan, a 3 Waters Assessment, a Carpark and Pavement Design and Testing, a Geotechnical Investigation and Report, a Traffic Assessment, an Earthworks Report, an Erosion and Sediment Report, a Detailed Structural Design, an Acoustic Report, a Resource Consent Package, and Drawings for Building Consent.

projects.title: Painoaiho Marae, Galatea, Bay of Plenty
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed a Geotechnical Investigation and Report, and Building Structure Design and Detailing for this project.

projects.title: Waiariki Bay of Plenty Polytechnic, Bay of Plenty
points: *Waipā Campus, Waipa State Mill Road, Rotorua, Bay of Plenty:* GDC completed a Geotechnical Assessment Report, Geotechnical Investigations for both locations, Foundation Design, Subgrade for Augered Piles Inspection, Subgrade Pile Holes Inspection, Remedial Design due to soil conditions, and issued PS4 certification for the Waipā Campus project.

*Whakatāne Campus, Whakatāne, Bay of Plenty:* GDC completed Test Piles Inspection, Pavement Design, Foundation Design, Geotechnical Testing and Report, Stormwater Testing, and a Stormwater Management Report. GDC also issued PS4 certification for this project.
*Mokoia Campus, Tihiotonga, Rotorua, Bay of Plenty:* GDC completed Truss Remedial Design and Detailing, Site Inspection, and issued PS4 certification for this project.

projects.jobDescription: GDC provided Structural Engineering services for this project.

projects.title: Fairy Springs Motel, Rotorua, Bay of Plenty
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed a Geotechnical Report and Structural Design for this project.

projects.title: Storey Avenue Child Care Centre, Hamilton, Waikato
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed 3 Waters and Structural Design for this project.

projects.title: Pump Station Latham Street, Napier, Hawke's Bay
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed the Structural Assessment Report for this project.

projects.title: Riverlea Road Community Centre, Hamilton, Waikato
points: GDC completed the refurbishment and conversion of an industrial site into a community facility for the Riverlea Road Community Centre project.
GDC delivered Interior Design for flexible spaces, including community areas, classrooms, a TV control room, and a mezzanine level, using movable walls for adaptability.
GDC delivered Architectural Design for additions such as a new accessible bathroom and kitchen, along with a covered walkway connecting areas.
GDC completed a full renovation, including structural upgrades, electrical systems, modern lighting, and quality finishes

projects.title: The Living Maori Village, Rotorua, Bay of Plenty
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed a Geotechnical Investigation and Assessment, an Initial Seismic Assessment (ISA), Structural Design, and a 3 Waters Assessment for this project.

projects.title: Ray Staiger Commercial Building, Hamilton, Waikato
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed a Topographical Survey, Three Waters Design, Pavement Design, Drawings, and Documentation to support Building Consent. GDC completed a Geotechnical Investigation and Report, Structural Engineering Design including calculations, drawings, specifications, PS1, Independent Peer Review (PS2), and Construction Monitoring for this project.

projects.title: Tamahere Hospital and Healing Centre, Waikato
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed Geotechnical and Stormwater Investigation and Report, Structural Design (including Foundation Design, Footing Design, and Posts for Portal Beams), Bracing Calculations, Wind Analysis, and Seismic Analysis. GDC completed Structural Drawings, Calculations, Specifications, PS1 documentation, and provided draughting services, site inspections, and issued three PS4 certificates covering structural, stormwater, and subgrade foundation works for this project.

projects.title: Paeroa Medical Centre, Paeroa, Waikato

projects.title: The Lost Springs, Whitianga, Coromandel, Waikato
points: *Stage 1:* GDC completed an Architectural 3D Model, Architectural Drawings for lodging Building Consent (including walkway additions, clamshell pool, and attached deck), and applied for Building Consent.

*Stage 2:* GDC completed Architectural Drawings, a Resource Consent application, a Three Waters Assessment Report, an Acoustics Report, a Traffic Report, an Architectural 3D Model for the Existing and Proposed stages, Soakage Testing and Report, and Emergency Lighting Design.

*Phase 1 and 2:* GDC completed Geotechnical CPT testing, a Fire Report, Structural Design for the steel structure, wall and roof bracing, Structural Design for Phase 2, a PS2 Peer Review, Footpath Structure Design, Piles and Footing Design, and Elevated Deck Structure Design.

*Phase 1 and 2:* GDC completed Geotechnical CPT testing, a Fire Report, Structural Design for the steel structure, wall and roof bracing, Structural Design for Phase 2, a PS2 Peer Review, Footpath Structure Design, Piles and Footing Design, and Elevated Deck Structure Design.

GDC also produced Structural Drawings, Calculations, Specifications, PS1 documentation, and provided draughting services, site inspections, and issued three PS4 certificates covering structural, stormwater, and subgrade foundation works for this project.

projects.title: Paeroa Medical Centre, Paeroa, Waikato
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed a Geotechnical Investigation and Report, completed Concrete Scanning and Verification, Structural Design, and Detailing for this project.

projects.title: Ngāruawāhia Town Hall, Ngāruawāhia, Waikato
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed a Detailed Seismic Assessment (DSA) for this project.

projects.title: Rotokauri Walkway, Waikato
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed a topographical survey, GIS investigation and analysis of the proposed track, designed the walkway, conducted geotechnical investigations and completed foundation recommendations, delivered detailed design drawings and documentation for a timber bridge and elevated boardwalks, and completed the application for land use consent and building consent for this project.

projects.title: Raglan Arts Centre, Waikato

GDC completed Stormwater Design, Repair Design of the Retaining Wall, Concrete Pavement Design and prepared detailed drawings.

projects.title: Munro Road Bridge, Pokeno
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed a Constructability Assessment Report for the bridge and retaining wall underpass, Bridge Design, Geometric Road Designs, Retaining Wall Design, and a Survey.Additional services included Lighting Design and Road Safety Audits during the design phase.

projects.title: Tuakau Dog Pound

projects.title: Huntly Dog Pound, Waikato
projects.jobDescription: GDC provided Geotechnical and Structural services for this project.

projects.title: Te Kauwhata Domain Walkway, Waikato
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed a Site Analysis Design, a set of construction drawings, a topographical survey, and a Geotechnical Investigation & Report for this project.

projects.title: Ngāruawāhia Dog Pound, Waikato
points: GDC completed an Architectural Concept Design and Plans (including designs for the car park).
GDC completed a Geotechnical Investigation for the building and car park, provided a 3 Waters Assessment Report, and completed a Field Survey / Topo Survey.
GDC completed Structural Design Drawings and Documentation, Three Waters Design Drawings and Documentation (including the carpark), a Fire Design Report, an Acoustic Report, and Lighting Design.
GDC completed the Resource Consent Application with an Environmental Assessment and applied for Building consent.

projects.title: Ngāruawāhia Dog Pound, Waikato
points: GDC completed an Architectural Concept Design and Plans (including designs for the car park).
GDC completed a Geotechnical Investigation for the building and car park, provided a 3 Waters Assessment Report, and completed a Field Survey / Topo Survey.
GDC completed Structural Design Drawings and Documentation, Three Waters Design Drawings and Documentation (including the carpark), a Fire Design Report, an Acoustic Report, and Lighting Design.
GDC completed the Resource Consent Application with an Environmental Assessment and applied for Building consent.

projects.title: Buckland Road Playground, Tuakau, Waikato

projects.title: Waitomo District Council Safety Improvements
points: Hooker Road Intersection Improvement - SH1
Noel Smith Corner Realignment - Peer Review SH39
Busbays, passing lanes, re-alignment and cycleway projects - Waikato Region
Identified sections of SH25 in the Coromandel Peninsula with motorcycle safety issues and prepared project feasibility reports for three sites - SH25 NZTA Motorcycle Safety Project

projects.title: Sir Howard Morrison Centre, Rotorua, Bay of Plenty
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed a Peer Review for the Seismic Strengthening and Upgrade of the Arts Centre. This included a Structural Peer Review, a Concrete Scanning Report covering 36 different locations, and Concept Seismic Strengthening.

projects.title: Waihi Museum, Waihi, Waikato
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed a Detailed Seismic Assessment (DSA), Seismic Strengthening, and Peer Review for this project.

projects.title: Cambridge Clock Tower, Cambridge, Waikato
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed geotechnical investigations and a report, as well as a Detailed Seismic Assessment for this project. Additionally, GDC produced strengthening designs, detailed drawings, and specifications to support building consent and construction.

projects.title: Cambridge Museum, Cambridge, Waikato
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed a Fire Report, a Geotechnical Investigation and Report (including CPT testing), Seismic Strengthening designs to 67% NBS, and As-Built Plans. (Heritage Bricks)

projects.jobDescription: GDC completed a Detailed Seismic Assessment (DSA) for this project.
